title: DisplayMatch: Browser-Based Perceptual Colour Calibration for Consumer Displays
venue: Course Project: Advanced Graphics and Image Processing
description: A browser-based perceptual color calibration tool for consumer displays using a novel matching algorithm

title: Improved 2D Gaussian Splatting Reconstruction from Sparse-view Images Using Diffusion Models
authors: Kyle Fram, Yifei Shi, Albert Kwok, Jacob Georgis
description: A proposed improvement to 2D Gaussian Splatting using Difix for sparse view augmentation
